SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.BrandName) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SiteCode , AA.BrandCode , AA.BrandName , AA.BrandURL , AA.GoodsCnt
FROM IKSMP.dbo.WCBrandInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SiteCode = #SiteCode#
AND ( AA.BrandCode = #FindText# OR AA.BrandName LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.SiteCode , AA.BrandCode , AA.BrandName , AA.BrandURL , AA.GoodsCnt
FROM IKSMP.dbo.WCBrandInfo AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.WCBrandInfo ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, SiteCode, BrandCode, BrandName, BrandURL, GoodsCnt ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #SiteCode#, #BrandCode#, #BrandName#, #BrandURL#, #GoodsCnt# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.WCBrandInfo SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, SiteCode = #SiteCode# , BrandCode = #BrandCode# , BrandName = #BrandName# , BrandURL = #BrandURL# , GoodsCnt = #GoodsCnt# WHERE ID = #ID#
